original_text: For at that time day by day there came to David to help him, until it was a great host, like the host of God.
korean_text: 그 때에 사람이 날마다 다윗에게로 돌아와서 돕고자 하매 큰 군대를 이루어 하나님의 군대와 같았더라

sentences.original_text: For at that time day by day
there came to David to help him
until it was a great host
